column4: The Distribution Upgrade hang on file 1022 of 1023 yet for 1 hour! Upgrade from 8.10 to 9.04! What I should do? Cancel the Operation or exist a other resolution?
I think I had that happen to.  I just cancelled and tried again, worked fine.  It's hanging on the download, right?
yes it s hanging on getting new packages. Ok I try again.
Now I have tried to restart the upgrade, but now came the error that could not download the upgrades. What I can do?
